chapter.title: Obscura User Documentation
chapter.para: This chapter contains the user documentation for Obscura. It is divided into sections that target different kinds of users. The first section is for traditional users who wish to use Obscura as a traditional, interactive tool. The second section is for programmers who wish to use Obscure as a library in their own programs.

section.title: Obscura as a Tool
section.para: In this section we describe the use of Obscura as a traditional, command-line driven tool. We describe installation, command-line syntax and options, and error message format.

section.title: Installation
section.para: Obscura requires that several prerequisites systems be installed...
